summary: This simple sound mod replaces the main theme with \"Sovngarde\" from Skyrim\'s soundtrack.
descriptionHtml:
This simple sound mod replaces the main theme with \"Sovngarde\" from Skyrim\'s soundtrack.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation:
just drag the \"music\" folder into \"Data\" (if on XP), or just drag the whole \"Data\" folder into the root of Skyrim\'s directory and merge its contents (Vista and above).
author: Chrom
